alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 31 at 3:00AM MDT until November 02 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts over 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Salt Lake Valley, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The gusty winds may also result in areas of reduced visibility due to blowing dust.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
